onChanged(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall).Description: Called when an event occurs and the corresponding callback is not overridden. The default implementation is no op. Error events are not re-directed to this callback and are handled in @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onError_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that is ready to make another call
onReadyToCall(android.net.sip.SipAudioCa.Description: Called when the call object is ready to make another call. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
SipProfile: the SIP profile of the caller
onRinging(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall,a.Description: Called when a new call comes in. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.
onRinging(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall,a.FullName: public void onRinging (SipAudioCall call, SipProfile caller)

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onCalling(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall).Description: Called when a request is sent out to initiate a new call. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onCallEnded(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall.Description: Called when the session is terminated. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
int: error code of this error
onError(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall,int.Description: Called when an error occurs. The default implementation is no op.
onError(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall,int.FullName: public void onError (SipAudioCall call, int errorCode, String errorMessage)

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onCallEstablished(android.net.sip.SipAud.Description: Called when the session is established. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onCallHeld(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall).Description: Called when the call is on hold. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onCallBusy(android.net.sip.SipAudioCall).Description: Called when the peer is busy during session initialization. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

Parameters: SipAudioCall: the call object that carries out the audio call
onRingingBack(android.net.sip.SipAudioCa.Description: Called when a RINGING response is received for the INVITE request sent. The default implementation calls @B_android#net#sip#SipAudioCall#Listener#onChanged_E@.

ClassDesc: Listener for events relating to a SIP call, such as when a call is being recieved ("on ringing") or a call is outgoing ("on calling"). Many of these events are also received by @B_android#net#sip#SipSession#Listener_E@.
